song_lyrics: Vivekī prāṇī kar vichār mukti pāmvā;
Mukti pāmvā sukhethī dhāmmā javā...
Ātmagnānī santno prasang jo bane;
To jarūr pragaṭ Hari meḷve tane... vivekī 1
Pragaṭ agnīthī bane rasoī to navī;
Andhkār jāy pragaṭ thāy jo ravī... vivekī 2
Pragaṭ aḍadthī vaḍā bane maḷe yadī;
Vātthī vaḍā banī shake nahi kadī... vivekī 3
Tem pragaṭ sant pragaṭ Shrī Hari maḷe;
Janma ne maraṇ taṇu dukh to ṭaḷe... vivekī 4
Dharma gnān bhakti ne vairāgya je vishe;
Evā sant sevtā ja moksha to thashe... vivekī 5
Vārīne valove mākhaṇ kyā thakī maḷe;
Tem vesh-dhārī thakī pāp shu baḷe... vivekī 6
Retīne pilāve kyāthī tel nīkḷe;
Ḍhongī dhurt guru seve tāru shu vaḷe... vivekī 7
Sadguru jarūr oḷkhāy lakshaṇe;
Brahmnishth sevtā ja kārya to baṇe... vivekī 8
Vishay taṇo tyāg thāy hraday ūghḍe;
Jarūr ehane prasange moksha to jaḍe... vivekī 9
Vānjhanī dhenuthī dūdh kyāthī pāmsho;
Dharmahīn sant sevī kyā pachhī jasho... vivekī 10
Devtāne durlabh satsang pāmīne;
Khachit tāḷjo vivekī sakaḷ khāmīne... vivekī 11
Shrīharinā putra pautra vachan je vade;
Laksh āṇī daksh sakaḷ dhārjo hrade... vivekī 12
title: Vivekī prāṇī kar vichār mukti pāmvā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-505: unknown

Category: Updeshna Pad
